channel.title: Hippo's Community Roast Mafia: Hippo's Farewell [Everyone Wins!]
channel.description:
## For Hippo...
In loving memory of our fallen brother, @Hippolytus, we have decided to host this final will that he left for us, his magnum opus.
# :arrow_right: [Hippo's Community Roast Mafia - Has Other Class Cards](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/community-roast-mafia/72320?u=livicus) :arrow_left:
Co-Hosts are @Kirefitten and @Pug
[details="You guys know this stuff"]
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging a host or co-host Lost Scum have no chat because of MEMEZ When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial they will be able to post a 1000 character defense through me, during this time no-one should post, everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent by messaging me After the votes are revealed, the King has 24 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed Executions end the Day Trials pause the counter
### Feedback Feedback is based on your abilities But otherwise, EFOL style feedback will be used
### Journals Message me your entire log, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
[/details]
[details="Fixed Cards"]
#### Note: SCUM has been changed so that if a Lost Scum joins the chat, and then is not the oldest SCUM, they will still be able to communicate with the new Icibalus. Marl's align rates have been changed to 60% BD 30% Lost Scum 10% Neut
[quote] # [color=skyblue]Hippolytus[/color] [color=skyblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Farewell Hippo (Passive)** - At the start of Day 2, you will suicide if you do not have **SALT**. **Reaction Master (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. Immune to conversion by Icibalus. **My Game, My Rules (Day)** - Jail a player. You will be able to send as many messages back and forth as you want that night. - oo uses **Not Greek At All (Night)** - Kill the jailed player. If they are Greek, Blue Dragon, or Memesky, you will suicide instead. - 5 uses [/quote]
[quote] # [color=orange]Icibalus[/color]
[color=orange]**Scum Special**[/color] **AtE (Passive)** - When on trial you must swear in every single post. **D0 xD (Passive)** - D0 you may convert one player into Lost Scum. If a Lost Scum targets you, they will be found and join your chat. **Moderror (Day)** - Your target will receive incorrect feedback tonight. - Infinite uses. **If I do then so must you (Night)** - Convert a player to the Scum as a Lost Scum. Their type depends on class type. Your first attempt on any player always fails. The second attempt on the same player is always successful, apart from Neutral Killers and Marluxion who are convert-immune. There is no limit to the number of Lost Scum there can be. - Infinite uses. *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/quote]
[quote] # [color=orange]Celeste[/color]
[color=orange]**Lost Scum Offended**[/color] **Ocean (Passive)** - You always have **SALT**. **SCUM (Passive)** - If you are the oldest Lost Scum you will become Icibalus. **The Rats are Dead (Day)** - Silently Poison Marluxion. If he is the same alignment as you, you will have to replace out and it is your responsibility to find a replacement. If you fail to do so, Icibalus will suicide. - 1 use **Camelot No Bueno (Night)** - Cause a player to be randomly redirected tonight. - 3 uses **Bastardize that S#!& (Night)** - Make bastard things in a forum game, occupying a player. - oo uses **Half-@$$ed Effort (Night)** - Kill a player. - oo uses (1-Night Cooldown)
[/quote]
[quote]
# [color=gray]Nerbins[/color]
[color=gray]**Neutral Citizen**[/color] **Literally (Passive)** - You have no ability. All invest results come back as “Target has no ability”. *Your objective is to survive.* [/quote]
[quote]
# [color=gray]NozBugz[/color]
[color=gray]**Neutral Citizen**[/color] **Literally (Passive)** - You have no ability. All invest results come back as “Target has no ability”. *Your objective is to survive.* [/quote]
[quote]
# [color=gray]Marcus_Doodalee[/color]
[color=gray]**Neutral Citizen**[/color] **Literally (Passive)** - You have no ability. All invest results come back as “Target has no ability”. *Your objective is to survive.* [/quote]
[quote]
# [color=gray]Blizer[/color]
[color=gray]**Neutral Citizen**[/color] **Literally (Passive)** - You have no ability. All invest results come back as “Target has no ability”. *Your objective is to survive.* [/quote]
[quote]
# [color=gray]Luxy[/color]
[color=gray]**Neutral Citizen**[/color] **Literally (Passive)** - You have no ability. All invest results come back as “Target has no ability”. *Your objective is to survive.* [/quote]
[quote] # [color=olive]Memesky[/color] ![18%20PM|494x498](upload://i9foFif8ENYI5ZVdCFT6cARRjjp.png)
[color=olive]**Unknown Memesky**[/color]
**The Ultimate Meme (Passive)** - You are immune to the effects of **SALT**. **SALT (Passive)** - All players who visit you and who you visit will be given **SALT**. If a player with **SALT** visits another player with **SALT** while Memesky is alive, they will both die. **No U (Day)** - Force a player to target themself if they use a day ability and night ability today and tonight. - oo uses **Spread the Meme (Day)** - You are able to use both night abilities tonight. - 1 use **Despacito (Night)** - Make all players think they were redirected, but in reality, nothing actually happened. You are forced to use this every night. - oo uses **Omega LUL (Night)** - Visit a player. - oo uses _Your objective is to make every other player alive have **SALT**._ [/quote]
[/details]
### Rolelist: [color=black]**Marluxion**[/color] [color=orange]**Icibalus**[/color] [color=orange]**Boopydoop**[/color] [color=skyblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=skyblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=skyblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=skyblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=skyblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=skyblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=skyblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=skyblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=skyblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color]/[color=gray]**Random Neutral**[/color] [color=skyblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color]/[color=gray]**Random Neutral**[/color] [color=gray]**Random Neutral**[/color] [color=gray]**Neutral Killer**[/color] [color=olive]**Memesky**[/color]
### Players: 1. Maximus 2. Insanity - [color=skyblue]Marluxion[/color] 3. Marl 4. Marcus 5. Luxy 6. Ici 7. Htm 8. Bin 9. Nerbins 10. Blizer 11. Squid - [color=skyblue]Hippolytus[/color] :sob: 12. Alfa 13. Math 14. Noz 15. Sam 16. Poke 17. Celeste
## Links [Day 1 Begins: Insanity is Marl's Double](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/hippos-community-roast-mafia-day-1-16-16/72482/444?u=livicus) [Day 2: Death of Hippo](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/hippos-community-roast-mafia-day-1-17-17-hippo-do-not-read-this-thread/72482/1020?u=livicus)
